SUMMARY 
 AROUND 10 YEARS of   experience   in   application   software   analysis,   design,   development   & 
implementation of n-tier  applications, primarily  in the  web environment with very strong knowledge of 
commercial application development environments.

Language Integrated Query (LINQ). 
 Participated in all the stages of software life cycle, starting from requirements gathering to realization of 
the system and end-user support. 
 Strong  Experience  in  End-to-End  Software  Development  Life  Cycle  called Waterfall (SDLC),  Application 
Development   Methodology (ADM)   and Agile (Scrum   and   Test-Driven   Development).   Created ER

Development   Methodology (ADM)   and Agile (Scrum   and   Test-Driven   Development).   Created ER 
Diagram, UML Modeling, Data Flow Diagram using Microsoft Enterprise Architect. 
 Actively involved in designing the architecture of Web based applications. 
 Extensive  experience  in  developing  Applications  using ASP.NET,  C#,  VB.NET,  MVC,  XML,  Xpath,  SSRS, 
SSIS,  ADO.NET,  Web  Services,  Java  Script,  NodeJS,  Angular  JS, jQuery, Knockout,  WCF,  OOPS,  HTML,
